name: Häagen-Dazs
description: Häagen-Dazs is a premium ice cream brand known for its rich flavors and high-quality ingredients. Founded in 1961 by Reuben and Rose Mattus in Brooklyn, New York, the brand was created to provide an authentic European ice cream experience in the United States. Häagen-Dazs uses only the finest ingredients, including real cream, milk, and sugar, with no artificial flavors or preservatives. The brand offers a wide range of flavors, from classic vanilla and chocolate to innovative combinations like salted caramel and green tea. Häagen-Dazs has expanded its product line to include sorbets, ice cream bars, and non-dairy options, catering to a diverse consumer base. The company emphasizes a commitment to sustainability, sourcing ingredients responsibly and supporting dairy farmers. Häagen-Dazs is recognized globally for its luxurious ice cream experience, and its products are available in supermarkets, convenience stores, and its own branded shops. The brand has also gained popularity for its collaborations with culinary experts and its involvement in various community initiatives, promoting the joy of enjoying high-quality ice cream. As a subsidiary of General Mills, Häagen-Dazs continues to innovate while staying true to its roots of delivering exceptional taste and quality.

seo.meta_title: Häagen-Dazs | Premium Ice Cream and Sorbet
seo.meta_description: Discover Häagen-Dazs, the brand known for its rich, creamy ice cream made from the finest ingredients. Explore our wide range of flavors and products.

faq.question: What is Häagen-Dazs known for?
faq.answer: Häagen-Dazs is known for its premium ice cream made from high-quality ingredients and a wide range of rich flavors.

faq.question: Where is Häagen-Dazs headquartered?
faq.answer: Häagen-Dazs is headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA.

faq.question: What are Häagen-Dazs's main products?
faq.answer: Häagen-Dazs's main products include various flavors of ice cream, sorbets, and ice cream bars.
